name: Magical Girls Clara & Suuya ~The Fallen Tentacle Seedbeds~
name_original: Magical Girls Clara & Suuya ~The Fallen Tentacle Seedbeds~
description:
[Premise / Concept]

A game where upon being captured by enemies,
the magical girls will have their magic drained...

[World Setting / Synopsis]

Humanity was under attack by an army of inter dimensional monsters.
Men were killed or enslaved in horrendous conditions and woman were
used as seedbeds to give birth to monsters anew. A world in chaos...

A few years of monster tyranny pass----

And another creature appears from the other dimension.
Giving humanity powers to fight against the monster army.

Fighting against the monster legions in their dazzling outfits.
Humanity called these saviors, "Magical Girls".

[System Overview]

[1] Event CG / H scenes gallery included!
All CG / H scenes are unlocked after clearing the game.

[2] Game becomes Open World after clearing!

[3] A readily accessible help feature included!
Settings, characters, system information all written in the help section.

[4] Confinement and sexual abuse after getting defeated!
When a magical girl's HP hits 0 she is taken to monster HQ for some discipline.
Impossible for her to escape by herself, she much be rescued by a companion.

[5] *(Hot!) Sexual abuse reduces a magical girls magic powers (MAX MP)!
This is this works greatest characteristic. If MAX MP = 0...

[6] *(Hot!) Confined magical girls receive brutal treatment!
A 'hostage system' has been introduced this time.
The more you resist and attempt to rescue a capture magical girl,
the worse her treatment will become... what a dilemma!!

[7] *(Hot!) The heroines expressions and lost MP changes with sensitivity!
Depending on the sensitivity of her various body parts things change.
(H scene text is double+ that of previous works!

[8] *(New!) In battle erotic attacks!
We've included the popular "Battle H" from previous works.
You're fighting seriously and all of the sudden...!?
An erotic turn of events can quickly lead to a magical girl pinch...
